file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs a cover of 'Yofukashi no Uta' by Creepy Nuts during her 3D live concert.
MC section after the first song performance where Mori Calliope welcomes the audience and introduces the concert theme.

subtitles.original: *Clears throat*
subtitles.english: *Clears throat*

subtitles.original: 皆さん、Welcome one and all to my very special Halloween night concert, J-RAP in JIGOKU!
subtitles.english: Everyone, welcome one and all to my very special Halloween night concert, J-RAP in JIGOKU!

subtitles.original: I hope you guys are already having a great time!
subtitles.english: I hope you guys are already having a great time!

subtitles.original: The first song that I kicked off this concert with is "Yofukashi no Uta"...
subtitles.english: The first song that I kicked off this concert with is "Yofukashi no Uta"...

subtitles.original: ...or in English, "A Staying Up Late Lullaby" or something like that.
subtitles.english: ...or in English, "A Staying Up Late Lullaby" or something like that.

subtitles.original: It's my favorite Creepy Nuts song ever and I actually got to perform it with Creepy Nuts a while back...
subtitles.english: It's my favorite Creepy Nuts song ever and I actually got to perform it with Creepy Nuts a while back...

subtitles.original: ...but that was a paid thing, a paid programming.
subtitles.english: ...but that was a paid thing, a paid programming.

subtitles.original: So this time, I got to perform it for you guys on this amazing stage!
subtitles.english: So this time, I got to perform it for you guys on this amazing stage!

subtitles.original: Isn't it so awesome?
subtitles.english: Isn't it so awesome?

subtitles.original: I feel like it really, like, it encapsulates the idea of J-RAP, which is my roots, by the way.
subtitles.english: I feel like it really, like, it encapsulates the idea of J-RAP, which is my roots, by the way.

subtitles.original: The theme of this concert is "Roots".
subtitles.english: The theme of this concert is "Roots".

subtitles.original: Like where do you come from, and you should never forget your roots. Well, my roots are in J-RAP.
subtitles.english: Like where do you come from, and you should never forget your roots. Well, my roots are in J-RAP.

subtitles.original: Japanese rap, they always have been for many years ever since I came here to Japan...
subtitles.english: Japanese rap, they always have been for many years ever since I came here to Japan...

subtitles.original: ...to be involved in the scene. Isn't it an amazing stage?
subtitles.english: ...to be involved in the scene. Isn't it an amazing stage?

subtitles.original: Look at it, we got graffiti everywhere! Oh my gosh, it's like...
subtitles.english: Look at it, we got graffiti everywhere! Oh my gosh, it's like...

subtitles.original: ...I mean it's graffiti, but it's very like Wafu.
subtitles.english: ...I mean it's graffiti, but it's very like Japanese-style.

subtitles.original: なんか、日本のテイストも入ってるから本当に最高。
subtitles.english: It's got some Japanese taste in it too, so it's really the best.

subtitles.original: めっちゃめちゃいい感じ。かっこいいっすね、このステージ。
subtitles.english: It feels great. This stage is so cool.

subtitles.original: この素敵な舞台の上に色んな...
subtitles.english: On this wonderful stage, various...

subtitles.original: ...J-RAP曲やってみたいと思います。
subtitles.english: ...J-RAP songs I'd like to perform.

subtitles.original: And there's so many different kinds of J-RAP and different communities within the genre of J-RAP.
subtitles.english: And there's so many different kinds of J-RAP and different communities within the genre of J-RAP.

subtitles.original: And so I tried to pick a lot of songs for the setlist that I guess are like very different from each other...
subtitles.english: And so I tried to pick a lot of songs for the setlist that I guess are like very different from each other...

subtitles.original: ...but still Japanese rap. And, um...
subtitles.english: ...but still Japanese rap. And, um...

subtitles.original: ...I think that you guys might also realize there's a bit of a story going on in between some of the songs...
subtitles.english: ...I think that you guys might also realize there's a bit of a story going on in between some of the songs...

subtitles.original: ...so I hope you guys will pay attention to that because that's also about my roots.
subtitles.english: ...so I hope you guys will pay attention to that because that's also about my roots.

subtitles.original: Moving on to the hashtag, the hashtag is #JRAPinJIGOKU.
subtitles.english: Moving on to the hashtag, the hashtag is #JRAPinJIGOKU.

subtitles.original: Like I said, #JRAPinJIGOKU. I hope you guys will take lots of screenshots.
subtitles.english: Like I said, #JRAPinJIGOKU. I hope you guys will take lots of screenshots.

subtitles.original: スクリーンショットいっぱい撮ってほしい！お願いします！
subtitles.english: I want you to take lots of screenshots! Please!

subtitles.original: はい！There's going to be a lot of really cool effects on the stage...
subtitles.english: Yes! There's going to be a lot of really cool effects on the stage...

subtitles.original: ...like there's an audio spectrum on the ground that like...
subtitles.english: ...like there's an audio spectrum on the ground that like...

subtitles.original: ...it like reacts to my vocals when I'm singing and stuff like that.
subtitles.english: ...it like reacts to my vocals when I'm singing and stuff like that.

subtitles.original: It's just... it's really cool. This is a dream live for me, so I hope you guys will enjoy!
subtitles.english: It's just... it's really cool. This is a dream live for me, so I hope you guys will enjoy!

subtitles.original: We also have a lot of really amazing guests, some that are going to blow your mind.
subtitles.english: We also have a lot of really amazing guests, some that are going to blow your mind.

subtitles.original: すごい、とても素敵なゲストも来るから皆さん...
subtitles.english: Some really great guests are coming, so everyone...

subtitles.original: ...見てください！これからもっと...
subtitles.english: ...please watch! From now on, more...

subtitles.original: ...なんか、え、え、どうしよう。
subtitles.english: ...like, uh, what should I do?

subtitles.original: あ、派手にぶちかまそうぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, let's go all out!

subtitles.original: そうですね、カリオペっぽいセリフ。
subtitles.english: Right, a Calliope-like line.

subtitles.original: Yeah, that's kind of my catchphrase these days.
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's kind of my catchphrase these days.

subtitles.original: Without further ado, let's move on to the next song!
subtitles.english: Without further ado, let's move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: Everyone, please enjoy and keep the party going! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Everyone, please enjoy and keep the party going! Let's go!
